alert.note: Alert for Cuming; Madison; Pierce; Stanton; Wayne (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 23 at 8:54AM CDT until September 23 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: The National Weather Service in Omaha has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Madison County in northeastern Nebraska... Northwestern Cuming County in northeastern Nebraska... Wayne County in northeastern Nebraska... Southeastern Pierce County in northeastern Nebraska... Northern Stanton County in northeastern Nebraska... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 854 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Norfolk, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Weather Instrument Measurement recorded a wind gust of 61 mph at Norfolk Airport. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Norfolk, Winside, Hadar, Hoskins, Carroll, and Lake Maskenthine Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
